Magic happening every week by being surrounded by so many driven entrepreneurs, inventors, investors, celebrities, CEOs, startups and more that are part of Eliances The place "Where Entrepreneurs Align" Turn up the volume on video. Experience it now: https://lnkd.in/em2bAaD
Find out what I asked Richard Branson about his mother, secrets revealed on the Eliances Heroes radio show. What did your mother teach you? https://lnkd.in/gtAjxdx http://ow.ly/i/zLTu9
Talk Show Host, Heroes Show Founder, Richard Branson, Samuel Adams, Pres of U.N.
Money Radio, a CRC Broadcasting Company

The Eliances Heroes shows has gained enormous popularity and quickly becoming one of the most popular talk shows on radio.  The premise of the show is focused on Heroes in Business, where we unmask our heroes and ask unique, thought provoking questions to understand their journey and how others can learn from them.Listen to us every Mon at Noon-1pm & Sat 9am-10am (AZ time) on Money Radio, AM1510, FM105.3, 50 other outlets and on Eliances.comSmall sampling of our Featured Heroes guests that have been interviewed by David Cogan:President of the United Nations, Mogens LykketoftAaron Marcus Actor over 1200 TV Movie Gotham, Law & Order, House of Cards moreAdrian Paul Warrior, the lead actor from the TV series HighlanderAlana Feld Top Executive Ringling Brothers circus Amy Cosper The Chief Editor of Entrepreneur MagazineAndy Germer VP MotorolaAnson Williams Potsie from Happy DaysAsh Kumra Young entrepreneur recognized by the White HouseBrad Hilton Grandson of Conrad Hilton, and former executive of iconic Hilton family hotel brandBrian Scudamore turned junk into $150Million company 1-800-GOT-JUNKBrian Smith Founder of UGG brand, famous sheepskin bootsBrendan Synott Founder of Bear Naked Foods, EVOL foods, Survivor Contestant & WearPactCindy McCain Chair Hensley Beverage, 3rd Anheuser-Busch distributor in the USChelsea Myers Miss Arizona 2016 competed for Miss USAChristine Jones fmr Go Daddy EVP, Congressional CandidateChuck Gray US House of Representatives Senate State Majority Leader State SenateDan Cane Founder of BlackBoard Inc, sold his co for $1.6BillionDan Dotson Star of the Reality TV show Storage WarsDan Nainan Comedian performed on all late night shows and for President ObamaDara Torres 12 time Olympic Medalist for SwimmingDavid Novak Chairman Yum! Brands (KFC, Pizza Hut, Taco Bell)David Traub Executive Producer of Jobs movie about Apple founder Steve Jobs Dina Dwyer-Owens Chair Billion $$ household brand business Molly Maids, Mr. Rooter

The ASU Mentor Network supports student, faculty, and community entrepreneurs. Ventures may be at a wide range of developmental stages, from ideation through commercialization. The mission of the network is to catalyze the entrepreneurial success of founders.

Eliances, "Where Entrepreneurs Align" This is the destination for entrepreneurs and those that want to start, grow, build, and expand their business.  We are building a community of those who have a passion and positive.Thanks to our Elianceships (partnerships/sponsorships) with the following; Money Radio, AZ Diamondbacks, BLK Live (restaurant & Concert hall) TradeSource, Phoenix Suns, Caliber Co, Grand Prix and ASU SkySong.We are also sponsors of Phoenix Startup Week (2014, 2015, 2016) and MovesMagazine "Big Game" Celebration with all the stars.* Listen to us every Thursday at 8:00am-9:00am on Money Radio, AM1510, FM99.3and also on social media* Read about us every week in the Phoenix Business Journal along with many featured stories about our members.Eliances Heroes Radio Show Host on Money Radio am1510 & fm99.3 Every Thursday at 9am (Arizona time)Small sampling of Featured Heroes guests that have been interviewed by David Cogan:Ed Smith Avent world’s largest distributor of electronic componentsEric Grosse Founder of Hotwire.com and former president Expedia.com Erik Olsson CEO Mobile Mini $445 Million CompanyEugenio Minnvielle Former CEO of Unilever & Nestle companies.Frank Zane he 3-time Mr. Olympia Champion name best physique of all time Gerard Adams Millennial who sold his company for $50Million dollars.Hap Klopp Founder The North FaceHenrik Fisker Legendary icon of luxury automotive design - Aston Martin, BMW, Fisker, VikingJeff DeWit AZ Secretary of Treasury manages $13 Billion in State assetsJim Koch CEO & Founder Brewer of Samuel Adams beer.Joe Arpaio A hero who is known as America’s Toughest SheriffJohn DeMartini Authority on human behavior, featured in “The Secret”.John Paul DeJoria Founder of Paul Mitchell systems and Patron Spirits, Forbes Richest PeopleJohn McCain Senator war hero American AZ political icon, Presidential CandidateJohn Sculley CEO AppleJon Fisher founding partner in the creation of Google Glass

Start, build, and grow companies. Mentor, teach, and guide in almost all areas of business.David Cogan is a serial entrepreneur, community trailblazer, and radio, television, and event master of ceremonies. Having worked for and consulting with Fortune 500 companies including IBM, Microsoft (via MF) and Andersen and now collaborating with a number of companies and startups.His most current project and passion is building a community that is comprised of angel investors, former Arizona state senators, celebrities, Ivy League college graduates, inventors (including one with over 200 patents), startups and media experts, as well as local and international business leaders. The community, Eliances, is the destination “Where Entrepreneurs Align.” Eliances brings together a high-level community of hybrid entrepreneurs with resources, influence, skills, contacts and imagination, in a weekly ROUNDtable and other highly sought after experiences that “foster collaboration among key players in the entrepreneurship ecosystem,” as reported by partner sponsor Arizona State University, Skysong.

Thank you, David, for all that you continually do.  Hats off!Wilson Casey of TriviaGuy.comTrivia Guinness World Record Holder

Peter Anadranistakis
President at Caliber - The Wealth Development Company
March 8, 2017, Peter worked with DAVID in the same group

Peter Anadranistakis is incredible to work with.  Peter and his company are strong supporters of the Eliances Community, Where Entrepreneurs Align.  He believes and supports our community and has helped many members which consist of entrepreneurs, investors, celebrities, startups and large companies. I've had the opportunity to have Peter on our Eliances Radio Show, TV, and present at the Eliances Secret Session where everyone learned a great deal from him. We have members of Eliances (including myself) that have invested in his company, Caliber Co, and more that are exploring the option.  I've found Peter to be very compassionate, energetic, smart, transparent, and professional.  Most important of all is that I can call him my friend.

summary: • Founder of Eliances, Where Entrepreneurs Align. • building private community of Entrepreneurs to start, build, & expand co. Large #of select people from celebrities, investors, startups, politicians, press, & inventors.• Direct Corporate experience being employed by IBM, Arthur Andersen, & Microsoft (via MF)• Entrepreneur business owner - Started (& exited) successful companies within ecommerce, ebay, distribution, healthcare, more.• Eureka Loft Adviser Mayors initiative • Adjunct college professor 10 years; created & taught ecommerce.• Education - BA, MBASome past accomplishments. • one of the first packaged resellers on ebay• one of the largest private employers based in the NW Valley• one of the largest sellers of clothing & accessories to overstock.com & major etailers.Key Notes• Talk show host & radio host for weekly am/fm broadcasted shows• Mayor's CEO ROUNDtable• Featured on NBC CH 12, Phoenix Business Journal, InBusiness Magazine, Arizona State University State Press, Money Radio am1510 fm99.3, MeetAdvisors TV, Wakeup America TV, City of Scottsdale Economic Report, Mayor's State of the City Presentation, Scottsdale City News, Wickenburg Sun Times, Arizona Republic, West Valley Newspaper, Sun Life Magazine, Buckeye Valley Newspaper, Kingdom In the Valley TV, KTAR radio fm92.3, AZ Book of lists 2014, 2015• City of Scottsdale Think Tank, Scottsdale Economic Development News• Presented at: Junior Achievement, motivating students to employment; Startup Week 2015 Super Hero of Entrepreneurs Presentation & 2016 Secrets of Hiring, Scottsdale Chamber Moderator, “Business With a Side of Startups;” Thunderbird School of Management, MC for “T-Bird Cultural Etiquette International Protocol”, MC for American Cancer Society Run, & Caliber Co (Inc 500) Summit. • Prior Credit Union Advisory Member• Facilitated, created, directed & presented weekly at over 200 events for CEOs, angels, investors, celebrities, startups, entrepreneurs, politicians& leaders
name: DAVID COGAN
title: Entrepreneur, Radio Host (AM/FM), Mentor, Founder Eliances.com "Where Entrepreneurs Align"
